notImplemented.message: This feature is not implemented yet! Please take a look at https://github.com/DivanteLtd/vue-storefront/issues for our Roadmap!

errorNotification.message: No products synchronized for this category. Please come back while online!

emptyCart.message: Shopping cart is empty. Please add some products before entering Checkout

unavailable.message: Some of the ordered products are not available!

stockCheck.message: Stock check in progress, please wait while available stock quantities are checked

offline.message: There is no Internet connection. You can still place your order. We will notify you if any of ordered products is not avaiable because we cannot check it right now.

unavailableConfiguration.message: No such configuration for the product. Please do choose another combination of attributes.
